comments.author: alex.lakatos.qa@gmail.com
comments.creator: alex.lakatos.qa@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Build identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

about:credits does not load for the first time in offline mode on a clean profile

Steps To Reproduce
1.Start Firefox with a clean profile
2.Enter Offline Mode
3.Go to about:credits
4.Exit Offline Mode
5.Go to about:credits
6.Enter Offline Mode
7.Go to about:credits

Actual Results:
3.about:credits does not load, instead you get a warning "Firefox is currently in offline mode and can't browse the Web."
5.about:credits loads
7.about:credits loads

Expected Results:
3.about:credits loads
5.about:credits loads
7.about:credits loads
